title: The richt vay to the kingdome of heuine is techit heir in the x co[m]mandis of God, and in the creid, and Pater noster, in the quhilk al christine me[n] sal find al thing [th]at is neidful and requirit to onderstand to the saluation of the saul
author: Pedersen, Christiern, 1480?-1554.
publicationStmtDate: the xvi day of October, Anno MDXXXiii. [1533]]
